body_html:
I’m not sure if cufft has it either. :) Thanks for the reference! It will be handy when I (or anyone) work on fftshift.
…
On Sun, Mar 25, 2018 at 12:53 Brandon Dube ***@***.***> wrote: Ok, thanks! FWIW, I do not know if cuFFT has its own fftshift these days, but there are implementations out there, e.g. https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=2663515&dl=ACM&coll=DL from a few years ago when it definitely did not. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
I’m not sure if cufft has it either. :) Thanks for the reference! It will
be handy when I (or anyone) work on fftshift.

On Sun, Mar 25, 2018 at 12:53 Brandon Dube <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> but there are implementations out there, e.g.

> years ago when it definitely did not.
